page.title: 12Llandaff Cathedral today.
page.content: The Catherdal is the impressive centre of religious and social life of Llandaff and is a hive of activity every day of the week. The Bishop is assisted by the Dean, Vicar and 3 Priests. The most popular Sunday service is the parish Eucharist at 9:00 am. The Holy Eucharist at 12:15 is the least well attended. 10 pupils of our school are members of the Parish Choir and 57 attend the Cathedral Sunday School. Many active clubs and societies are connected with the Cathedral, including the Young Wives, Mother's Union, The Men's Society, Guides and Scouts. Every day Tourists visit the ancient building and view the Majestas by Epstein.
